short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide posts from unwanted users on PoE Forum

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocklist extension for pathofexile official forum. Open options page and add a user u don't want to read. Choose one of five post styles which determine strictness of visual representation.
